name: The world vs Nature V: Dance Macabre
description: There is a constant tension between THE WORLD: Us, what we are, what we have created as a civilization both industrially and spiritually. All the beauty + ugliness inside us.  And what just is: NATURE: what is alive, what is free and unpredictable.  Nature exists outside of us and (hopefully) will continue existing when we are gone.  I have a long-term plan to showcase this constant struggle in my work, come join me!
